body:
## Bug Report

### What version of TiKV are you using?
v4.0.0-rc.2

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
Not needed

### Steps to reproduce
(Enable new collation from TiDB)
```
tidb> select * from mysql.tidb;
+-----------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| VARIABLE_NAME         | VARIABLE_VALUE                                                                                  | COMMENT                                                                                |
+-----------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|...
| new_collation_enabled | True                                                                                            | If the new collations are enabled. Do not edit it.                                     |
|...
+-----------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
10 rows in set (0.01 sec)

tidb> create table t(a char(10) collate ascii_bin);
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.08 sec)

tidb> insert into t values ('1'), ('2'), ('3');
Query OK, 3 rows affected (0.04 sec)
Records: 3  Duplicates: 0  Warnings: 0

tidb> select * from t where a='1';
```

### What did you expect?
Query succeeded.

### What did happened?
```
tidb> select * from t where a='1';
ERROR 1105 (HY000): other error: [components/tidb_query/src/batch/runner.rs:83]: BatchSelectionExecutor: Evaluate error: [components/tidb_query/src/codec/error.rs:212]: invalid schema: UnsupportedCollation { code: -65 }
```
title: tidb_query: a compatibility issue for `ascii_bin` collation from TiDB
